text: The Asian and Oceanian Zone is one of the three zones of regional Davis Cup competition in 2007. In the Asian and Oceanian Zone there are four different groups in which teams compete against each other to advance to the next group. ==Participating teams== * * * * * * * * ==Draw== ==First Round Matches== ===Chinese Taipei vs. Thailand=== ===China vs. Japan=== ===Uzbekistan vs. India=== ===South Korea vs. Kazakhstan=== ==Second Round Matches== ===Japan vs. Thailand=== ===South Korea vs. Uzbekistan=== ==First Round Play-offs== ===Chinese Taipei vs. China=== ===Kazakhstan vs. India=== ==Second Round Play- offs== ===Kazakhstan vs. China=== ==References== *Draw Asia/Oceania Zone Group I Category:Davis Cup Asia/Oceania Zone
title: 2007 Davis Cup Asia/Oceania Zone Group I
